description: News about the International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature.

items.title: 7 Oct 2013
items.summary: <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> 2014 election results are available.

items.title: 1 Feb 2012
items.summary: Philip Cantino reports on the progress of the PhyloCode Companion Volume.

items.title: 16 Nov 2011
items.summary: A proposal to amend the PhyloCode with respect to species has been posted.

items.title: 6 Sep 2011
items.summary: Kevin de Queiroz reports on the progress of the PhyloCode Companion Volume.

items.title: 2 Feb 2010
items.summary: Version 4c of the draft PhyloCode has been posted online.

items.title: Third Meeting
items.summary: The third meeting of the <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> was held at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, 20–22 July 2008.

items.title: Second Meeting
items.summary: The second meeting of the <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> was held at Yale University in New Haven, Connecticut, June 28–July 2 2006.

items.title: First Meeting
items.summary: The first meeting of the <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> was held at Mus√©um National d'Histoire Naturelle in Paris, France 6–9 July 2004.
